column4: hey folks.  i hear a loud annoying beep (in any application), that comes out of my laptop's headphones whenever i hit backspace when theres nothing left to backspace.  how can i get rid of this?  ubuntu 10.04
system->settings->audio, there you can set and disable the 'warning noise'
my sound theme is no sounds;  alert volume is down to 0 and set to "Mute"
is there a slide for beep in alsamixer?
yes beep was set at 100.  muted it and problem is gone
